hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) did not leave behind a Dinar nor a Dirham, nor a sheep, nor a camel, and he did not make a will concerning anything.”

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ أَوْصَى رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Did The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) Make A Will?
